objective_seeds.name: Recover the Lost Relic
objective_seeds.description: A powerful or significant artifact has been lost, stolen, or hidden. The party must locate and secure it.

stakes.on_success: The relic is secured and its influence contained.
stakes.on_failure: The relic empowers an enemy or destabilizes the region.

objective_seeds.name: Protect the Vulnerable
objective_seeds.description: A community or individual is under imminent threat.

stakes.on_success: Lives are saved and trust is earned.

objective_seeds.name: Expose the Hidden Truth
objective_seeds.description: A secret threatens to reshape power or belief if revealed.

stakes.on_success: The truth alters the balance of power.

objective_seeds.name: Escape the Encroaching Doom
objective_seeds.description: A growing danger must be fled or outrun before it closes in.

stakes.on_success: The party survives and retains agency.
stakes.on_failure: They are trapped, scattered, or consumed.

objective_seeds.name: Break the Siege
objective_seeds.description: A stronghold, district, or sanctuary is under sustained pressure; the party must end the siege or slip through it.

stakes.on_success: The besieged endure and the enemy loses momentum.
stakes.on_failure: The defense collapses and innocents pay the price.

objective_seeds.name: Stop the Convergence
objective_seeds.description: A rite, machine, or phenomenon nears completion; the party must interrupt it before it reshapes reality.

stakes.on_success: The threat is delayed or neutralized.
stakes.on_failure: The world changes in a lasting way.

objective_seeds.name: Escort the Key
objective_seeds.description: A person, object, or message must reach a destination intact despite pursuit and sabotage.

stakes.on_success: The key arrives and unlocks a decisive advantage.
stakes.on_failure: The key is captured or destroyed, shifting the balance.

objective_seeds.name: Secure the Treaty
objective_seeds.description: A fragile alliance or agreement must be forged under pressure, deceit, and competing interests.

stakes.on_success: Peace, access, or unity is achieved.

objective_seeds.name: Cleanse the Blight
objective_seeds.description: A spreading corruption poisons land, minds, or institutions; the party must find and sever its source.

stakes.on_success: The blight recedes and survivors recover.
stakes.on_failure: The corruption becomes permanent and expands.

objective_seeds.name: Steal the Blueprint
objective_seeds.description: A plan, ledger, or design will enable catastrophe if completed; the party must steal or destroy it.

twist_candidates.name: The Villain Is a Decoy
twist_candidates.description: The apparent antagonist is not the true source of the threat.

twist_candidates.name: Time Is Running Out
twist_candidates.description: Events progress toward disaster if the party delays.

twist_candidates.name: An Ally Turns
twist_candidates.description: A trusted figure reveals conflicting loyalties at a critical moment.

twist_candidates.name: Success Has a Cost
twist_candidates.description: Achieving the goal triggers an unforeseen consequence that must be faced.

twist_candidates.name: The Enemy Is Not What They Seem
twist_candidates.description: The antagonist’s motives complicate the moral landscape and solutions.

twist_candidates.name: The Key Is Someone
twist_candidates.description: The critical ‘object’ is a living person or sentient being with agency and demands.

twist_candidates.name: Another Party Wants the Same Prize
twist_candidates.description: Rivals pursue the same objective, forcing tradeoffs, bargains, or conflict.

twist_candidates.name: The Ground Refuses to Stay Still
twist_candidates.description: Routes, rooms, or landmarks rearrange; navigation and assumptions fail.

twist_candidates.name: Your Patron Is Complicit
twist_candidates.description: The one who sent the party benefits from the threat—or helped cause it.

twist_candidates.name: Mercy Returns With Teeth
twist_candidates.description: A spared foe, freed captive, or forgiven rival returns with consequences.

antagonist_candidates.name: The Void Behemoth
antagonist_candidates.goal: Feed on instability within the Weave.

antagonist_candidates.name: The Crownless Regent
antagonist_candidates.goal: Seize authority through fear or manipulation.

antagonist_candidates.name: The Iron Bailiffs
antagonist_candidates.goal: Collect debts and expand control under ‘lawful’ pretense.

antagonist_candidates.name: The Blistering Fog
antagonist_candidates.goal: Spread, suffocate, and erase paths and memory.

antagonist_candidates.name: The Glass Oracle
antagonist_candidates.goal: Manipulate outcomes to force a foretold future.

antagonist_candidates.name: The Hollow Host
antagonist_candidates.goal: Assimilate communities into a single will.

antagonist_candidates.name: Rift Poachers
antagonist_candidates.goal: Harvest unstable sites and sell what should remain buried.

antagonist_candidates.name: The Last Warden
antagonist_candidates.goal: Prevent anyone from touching a sealed truth—at any cost.

set_piece_candidates.name: The Collapsing Crossing
set_piece_candidates.failure_consequence: separation, injury, or loss of resources

set_piece_candidates.name: The Midnight Exchange
set_piece_candidates.failure_consequence: deal turns into a trap or chase

set_piece_candidates.name: The Forced Split
set_piece_candidates.failure_consequence: one group is cornered or misled

set_piece_candidates.name: The Trial of Names
set_piece_candidates.failure_consequence: a secret is exposed or access is denied

optional_constraints.description: Combat should be rare and dangerous.
Actions have visible social and political repercussions.
Healing, rest, and supplies are scarce.
Final death reversal may be possible at great cost.
Preferred solutions emphasize restraint and non-lethal outcomes when possible.
Information is fragmented; investigation and inference are central.
The campaign is anchored in one primary location with deep exploration.
The environment itself is a persistent threat.
NPCs and factions conceal motives; trust is a resource.
